name: Tokyo
description: A city where major tourist attractions such as Senso-ji, Tokyo Tower, Skytree, Akihabara, and Shibuya are gathered.

name: Kyoto
description: A city rich in historical landmarks such as Kinkaku-ji, Kiyomizu-dera, Fushimi Inari Taisha, Arashiyama, and Nijo Castle.

name: Osaka
description: A lively city with attractions such as Osaka Castle, Dotonbori, Universal Studios Japan, and Umeda Sky Building.

name: Nara
description: A place where you can enjoy the atmosphere of an ancient city with sites like Todai-ji, Nara Park, and Kofuku-ji.

name: Hiroshima
description: A place where history and nature are blended, featuring sites such as Peace Memorial Park, the Atomic Bomb Dome, and Miyajima (Itsukushima Shrine).

name: Hokkaido
description: Featuring lavender fields in Furano and Biei, the Sapporo Clock Tower, Odori Park, Goryokaku in Hakodate, and night views.

name: Okinawa
description: A resort area with attractions such as Churaumi Aquarium, Shuri Castle, and Kouri Island.

name: Mount Fuji
description: A representative mountain of Japan, featuring the Fuji Five Lakes and climbing Mount Fuji.

name: Hakone
description: A hot spring area with attractions such as Hakone Yumoto, Lake Ashi, and Owakudani.

name: Takayama
description: A place with traditional scenery, featuring Hida Takayama and Shirakawa-go (Gassho-style houses).

name: Kanazawa
description: A cultural tourist destination with attractions such as Kenrokuen, Kanazawa Castle, and Higashi Chaya District.

name: Matsumoto
description: A place where you can enjoy both nature and history, featuring Matsumoto Castle and Kamikochi.

name: Nagoya
description: A city with attractions such as Nagoya Castle, Atsuta Shrine, and the Nagoya City Science Museum.

name: Kobe
description: A port town with tourist attractions such as Kobe Harborland, Chinatown, and Mount Rokko.

name: Nagasaki
description: A city rich in historical landmarks such as Glover Garden, Peace Park, and Gunkanjima.

name: Fukuoka
description: A city with many tourist spots such as Ohori Park, Fukuoka Tower, and Canal City Hakata.

name: Miyagi
description: A tourist destination with attractions such as Sendai (Aoba Castle Ruins, Matsushima).

name: Aomori
description: A place where you can enjoy history and culture, featuring Hirosaki Castle and the Nebuta Festival.

name: Niigata
description: A region rich in nature and culture, featuring Sado Island and Echigo-Yuzawa.

name: Shizuoka
description: A hot spring area featuring Atami Onsen and the Izu Peninsula.

name: Yamanashi
description: A tourist destination with attractions such as Fuji-Q Highland and Kiyosato Plateau.

name: Okayama
description: A city with historical landmarks such as Okayama Castle and Korakuen Garden.

name: Kagawa
description: A cultural tourist destination with attractions such as Kotohiragu Shrine and Naoshima (modern art).

name: Tokushima
description: A place where you can enjoy nature and culture, featuring the Naruto whirlpools and Awa Odori.

name: Ehime
description: A city where you can enjoy history and hot springs, featuring Matsuyama Castle and Dogo Onsen.

name: Kochi
description: A place where you can enjoy nature and history, featuring Katsurahama Beach and Kochi Castle.

name: Saga
description: A place with historical landmarks such as Yoshinogari Historical Park and Karatsu Castle.

name: Kumamoto
description: A city with many tourist attractions such as Kumamoto Castle and Mount Aso.

name: Oita
description: A hot spring area with attractions such as Beppu Onsen and Yufuin.

name: Kagoshima
description: A place where you can enjoy nature and history, featuring Sakurajima and Senganen Garden.

name: Tochigi
description: A region rich in nature and history, featuring Nikko Toshogu Shrine and Kegon Falls.

name: Ibaraki
description: A place where you can enjoy nature and culture, featuring Kairakuen and Fukuroda Falls.

name: Gunma
description: A region rich in hot springs, featuring Kusatsu Onsen and Shima Onsen.

name: Chiba
description: A tourist destination with attractions such as Tokyo Disney Resort and Naritasan Shinshoji Temple.

name: Saitama
description: A region with tourist destinations such as Kawagoe and Nagatoro.

name: Kanagawa
description: A region rich in tourist attractions such as Kamakura, Yokohama, and Hakone.

name: Mie
description: A tourist destination with attractions such as Ise Jingu Shrine and Toba Aquarium.

name: Shiga
description: A place where you can enjoy nature and history, featuring Hikone Castle and Lake Biwa.

name: Wakayama
description: A tourist destination with attractions such as Mount Koya and Shirahama Onsen.
